message.entry: The hardware manager device's CustomData property needs to have a field called "TransportProperties".
The getTransportProxy method must return a value of type "internal.matlab.inspector.InspectorProxyMixin".
Selecting a different device will disconnect and close the current {0} connection.
Closing the app will disconnect the current {0} connection.
Refreshing the device list will disconnect and close the current {0} connection.
Removing the device will disconnect and close the current {0} connection.
To export the generated MATLAB code and Communication Log before closing, click "No" and use the "Export" button in the toolstrip.\n\nContinue?
Unable to detect a connection to the hardware or server. Ensure that the hardware is plugged in or the server is running.
